thread.title: CustomerMrs A Wheatley
thread.title_full: tyresonthedrive.com reviewed by CustomerMrs A Wheatley

author: CustomerMrs A Wheatley
title: CustomerMrs A Wheatley
text: I am very happy to recommend Tyres on the Drive. I received prompt and friendly service. They kept in touch by text, email and phone so I knew exactly when the technician would arrive. He was very efficient and fitted a new tyre on my car, which was parked on a main road not on the drive, in no time at all. I have no hesitation in recommending Tyres on the Drive.
